title: Becastled Free Download Direct Link
description:
Becastled is a military-strategic city- building simulator with cartoon graphics. Before you is a magical world in which you will build various defensive castles, which will then test the strength of the most dangerous enemies. It is not enough for you to build high walls
you need to organize effective extraction of all the necessary resources to survive a possible long siege. Plan your castle to effectively resist a wide variety of attacks and siege weapons. Do not forget to train your soldiers so that at the right time they act clearly and quickly .

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 3.9GHz or AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM with Shader Model 5.0 or better)
